checklistName: Engineering Team Director for New Hire
checklistDescription: TODO Items for the engineering team director for a new hire.

sayHi.description: Reaches out to new hire to say hello and set up coffee chat

explainBillableHours.description: Explain billable hours during coffee chat- emphasize your policy re: billable hours. (Many new staff members will need to be reassured on this point.

introductoryCheckin.description: Have an introductory check in with them, set up by the Facilitator

hiringFeedback.description: Get feedback from new hire on hiring process

setupForInterviews.description: If candidate is comfortable, set them up doing interviews with a veteran interviewer
